column3: 2018Amazon has started another accelerator program to find startups focused on voice technology.

column1: Amazon will select 13 companies to participate
column2: according to an Amazon blog announcing the program.

column1: This is the second accelerator program
column2: following one that ended with presentations to investors late last year.

column1: Companies selected will receive mentorship and guidance from local Amazon teams as they build for presentations at the end of the 13-week program.
The categories for Alexa innovation are smart home
column10: hardware components and other enabling technologies.
